feed.title: cassiterite website log
feed.subtitle: cassiterite's blog about their websites and other creative endeavors

entry.title: 06/23 Updates
entry.content:
• I've made a lot of updates lately to my Recently Read page.
  • I've also added stories written by me about my character David to the stories section. (Each of them also have links to where you can find them on AO3 if you'd like to leave kudos or comments.)

entry.title: Github Website
entry.content: Between yesterday and today I have gotten this website, my Github-based website log, up and running. I'm going to be using it to log my various website creation and maintanence tasks as I accomplish them, and perhaps some of my art indeavors as well.
